attributes.action: Remove the title 'honourable' in reference to the members of parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of continued dishonourable behaviour from members of parliament of all sides, coupled with the continued poor record of honesty and truth within the house of commons the reference to 'honourable' should no longer be prefixed to MPs.  This title should be an earned priviledge and certainly not used by those who do not deserve it

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
